attributes.action: Keep all fuel prices at £1 A litre! Your crippling the people of the uk!
attributes.additional_details: Keep fuel at £1 a litre there is no need to keep rising, the people of the UK can’t afford it, drop the tax!
attributes.background: People need to drive, to get to work, school, Lorry drivers are being hit the hardest, if it wasn’t for them the UK would shut down!

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
